## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 40,000                                  |
| Rationale                         | This order size covers the forecasted demand for the next 5 days, plus an additional 5 days' worth of inventory to account for potential demand variability. It also utilizes the largest available vendor order quantity, which may offer cost advantages or discounts.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  The player's planned order of 40,000 units matches the recommended order size. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | ~2.1  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 10  |
| Comments                          | This order size allows for ample coverage of forecasted demand and provides a buffer for potential fluctuations. It also balances the need to meet demand with the potential cost savings of purchasing a large order quantity.  |
